channel.title: trdsql on Noboru Saito's page
channel.description: Recent content in trdsql on Noboru Saito's page

item.title: trdsql install
item.description: Install For Linux/Windows/macOS, Download. It is made in Go and has no other dependent libraries, so it can be deployed and executed immediately. Docker If Docker is available, you can also run it with Docker. You can also use docker pull from Docker Hub, so please pull as follows. docker pull noborus/trdsql Mount and use the input file location. Since the result is output to the standard output, it can be received by redirection as it is.
